11.title: Organisations ü¶úüîó
11.content: Illio . Wealth Insights that make sense to everyone Overview . We aim to bring simplicity, efficiency and transparency to the wealth industry. Traditionally, analyzing wealth is a complex process which doesn't help advisor productivity. Furthermore, explaining wealth is often jargon intense which doesn't help stakeholders' understanding of what they own. Our modular wealth platform is designed to support wealth firms, online platforms, family offices, asset or fund managers with time saving analytics, user friendly visualizations and personalized portfolio Insights. Industry . Financial Services Company size . 11-50 employees Tech Stack . AWS, Kotlin, AWS, Python . Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è by Abrar Mudhir © 2024 >             .
